biography_text: TAYLOR, Scott William, a Representative from Virginia; born in Baltimore, Md., June 27, 1979; graduated from Mardela High School, Mardela Springs, Md., 1997; certificate in Public Procurement and Contract Management, Old Dominion University; A.L.B., Harvard University Extension School, Cambridge, Mass., 2013; United States Navy, 1997-2005; real estate broker; entrepreneur; author; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010; member of the Virginia state house of delegates, 2014-2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
